scripts.dev: prisma migrate dev && node --no-warnings --watch --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.docker-dev:build: docker buildx build . -f docker/Dockerfile --target development -t snaily-cad-bot:dev
scripts.docker-prod:build: docker buildx build . -f docker/Dockerfile --target production -t snaily-cad-bot:prod
scripts.docker-dev:start: npm run docker-dev:build && docker compose -f dev.compose.yaml up -d && npm run docker:clean-build
scripts.docker-prod:start: npm run docker-prod:build && docker compose -f prod.compose.yaml up -d && npm run docker:clean-build
